p: The complete datasets for each isogenic pair, including protein identification and quantitation results as well as label ratios and statistical test results, can be found in Supplementary Data 1. Peptide-to-spectrum matching was performed for all 3 isolates using the A1 subassemblage genome (WB C6, ATCC 50 803). This reference has few single-nucleotide polymorphisms relative to other sequences to date [ 34] and has been previously used as a database for proteomic analysis of all 3 isolates with no significant differences in peptide identifications [ 35]. A nonredundant total of 1,571 proteins was identified across the TMT 10plexes analyzed, with 1,220, 1,126, and 1,060 proteins identified in 10plex 1–3, respectively (Table 2).
